description:
Both the English and Japanese closed captions for SM24 do not give a name for her and just list her as Lana`s Mother. She is the mother of Sarah, Harper and Lana and lives with them in the Alola Region on Melemele Island.
Parents and Guardians were invited to the Pokémon School for Visitation Day. Lana`s Mother made her first brief appearance catching her kids who were running around the school and tried to calm them down by telling them they could go to the Pokémon School when they were older.
Despite her brief appearance in the episode, Lana`s Mother has spawned a huge popularity in the Pokémon Fanart community as well as in the hentai doujinshi market due to her scene in SM24 which featured her children rubbing up against her large breasts as she tried to wrangle them up.
name: Suiren no Okaasan
